script.help: To use this script, find the video at YouTube. In the url you will see a v= parameter. Enter the id after the = sign in the field below.

item.content: <object width="[WIDTH caption="Width (px)" default="400"]" height="[HEIGHT caption="Height (px)" default="300"]"> <param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/[VIDEOID caption="Video Id" help="Enter the video id from the v= parameter"]&hl=en&fs=1"></param> <param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param> <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param> <param name="wmode" value="trasparent"></param> <embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/[VIDEOID]&hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="[WIDTH]" height="[HEIGHT]" wmode="transparent"></embed></object>
